RemediationStrings.Title: Cybereason is not installed.
RemediationStrings.Description: To continue to use this device, Cybereason must be installed.

RemediationStrings.Title: One or more Cybereason services are not running.
RemediationStrings.Description: Ensure all Cybereason protection services are running.

RemediationStrings.Title: Real-time protection is disabled.
RemediationStrings.Description: To ensure maximum protection, enable real-time protection in Windows Defender or Cybereason.
